title_short: (2240) Ferreira do Zêzere - Avenida 13 de Junho

This place is particularly practical for logistics (Food/fuel, Camping-Gas) but also for laundry since a self-service washing machine is available. The road adjoining the car park is quite busy but the nuisance is bearable. Optimal satellite and 4G reception.

title: (2240) - Unnamed Road

title: (2240) - N348
description:
Small gravel car park with magnificent view of the lake. Some cars parked during the day. Quiet night, access to swimming. Single electricity plug inside a little warehouse free to use.
very nice view, access to the river, in the next beach there is a swimming pool.

title: (2240) - N348
description: Perfect to spend the day and sleep, very quiet. There are stairs that lead to a bathroom area.

name: Praia fluvial de Fernandaire
title: () Praia fluvial de Fernandaire

title: (6110) Vila de Rei - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice quiet place on the lake. We are alone here at the moment of writing. This place is not suitable for large campers, the road to it is unpaved, potholes and low hanging branches. With a 4x4 van with/or roof tent, like us, is very nice! what a rest.

title: (2230) Souto -
description: Schöner Platz am See mit Badezugang. 2 Marmor Picknicktische. Gerader Stellplatz. Sehr steile Zufahrt bergab, für mutige Fahrer. Nicht für Wohnmobile.  NICHT größer als VW Bus. Achtet auf das Wetter. Regen—> rutschig

title: (2240) Dornes - EM521
description: Very quiet place to spend the night, overlooking Dornes, inside the locality it is very difficult to go since the streets are very narrow for larger camper vans.

title: (2300) Tomar -
description: Beautiful little beach on Lake Carril, a stone's throw from Tomar! If you are looking for a place in nature for the night in order to visit Tomar the next day as I was, this is a great solution! Only downsides: the motorway which is really not far but little frequented at night, and the access which is a little steep on a dirt road should be avoided in rainy weather.

title: (2240-611) Dornes - Rua Rainha Santa Isabel
description: Beautiful place with amazing view over dornes town. Strong recommendation to walk fown on foot first as there is no turning around when cars are parked. its rather small and with a bit difficult access (narrow road). I wouldn't recommend it during summer months as its right next to the local lake beach and many cars park in this tight spot. would be ok overnight though. easy access to dornes town by bike 5min or by cannoe / sup 2min /walking 20min

title: (2240) Dornes - 10 Rua Nossa Senhora do Pranto

title: (2300-404) Quinta da Choupana
description:
Educational farm of 2.7 hectares, quiet and peaceful place. 4 km from the Templar city of Tomar, 30 km from the Sanctuary of Fátima, 1h30 from Lisbon and 2 hours from Porto. Near the dam of Castelo de Bode, Penedo Furado em Villa de Rei, dam of the Caril ...
Price for 2 adults and 2 children up to 13 years old. €5 extra per person.
Use of the swimming pool: €2/day/person.
THANKS

name: Camping Lake Portugal

description: Quiet spot for a van or van short with a hold to level.

name: Quinta das Lameiras
title: (2300) Quinta das Lameiras
description: Hello friends Our humble Biological Farm with an area of ​​3ha. We are 9km from the Templar city of Tomar, 4km from the river beach of Alverangel, 2.5km from the clean water river. Train station 3km away. We can be your Uber. We have a Hostel4campers with enough space for campers, caravans and some tents. Access to private bathroom; Common interior room (40m2 with sofas, swings and area for children to play; free kitchen with large table, free fridge, only washing machine and gas stove are paid ; There is also a outdoor leisure area with swings. Electricity 10amp; Disposal of dirty water and access to drinking water. Fresh homemade bread.. We can have a traditional Portuguese meal. We look forward to welcome you. Don't hesitate to visit our profile on Instagram (quinta_das_lameiras) or FB (Quinta das Lameiras - Sº Pedro de Tomar). We have a small grocery store where you can find products from our farm and other farmers. Depending on the season we have vegetables, fruit, eggs, cottage cheese, olive oil and duck meat, lamb, chicken and turkey, rice, tuna, vinegar, etc. Being happy is the most important thing! Our backyard is the world! Love of João, Sara and Children

name: Parque de Campismo do Bostelim
title: (6110) Parque de Campismo do Bostelim
description: Rural campsite (Summer time) but external flat parking open all year round. Inside camping, electricity, hot water shower, wc, grills, lots of shadows, river beach. Access to electricity and water.

name: Bonjardim Boutique Hotel
title: (6100-459) Bonjardim Boutique Hotel
description:
Welcome to Bonjardim Boutique Hotel, Restaurant & Wines, an award-winning organic wine estate, slowfood restaurant and boutique hotel. The country manor dates back to 1756 and it is located in the tranquil green heart of Portugal. Wake up to vineyard views, indulge in wine tastings, explore our top-rated rooftop restaurant (rated 9+ / 10 on TheFork.com), or just take a relaxing walk in our private forest. Whether you’re a wine lover, digital nomad or foodie, we’ll make you forget the busy city life and help you explore the unspoiled center of Portugal.

Stay per night (includes water & electricity): €15 (if more than 2 persons, it is €3 per extra person)
Breakfast: €10 (reservation needed the day before)

Free amenities:
Indoor & Outdoor Swimming Pool
WiFi (password: bonjardim)
Parking for your motorbike
Top quality drinking water from our own well

Activities & services:
Wine cellar tour: €5 per person Wine tasting: €10 per person
Organic wine shop: You can buy Bonjardim natural wines in the restaurant. 
Wine course on request (min. 4 people): 1.5 hours (€25 per person). The themes are: Organic wine production; technical tasting; wine regions of Portugal; spirits. 
Restaurant with rooftop terrace: slowfood fusion menu with estate-grown and local produce. No reservations please, just walk in! For opening times, search “Bonjardim Sky Lounge Restaurant” or scan QR code:
Sauna: €7,50, Turkish bath: €7,50, Jacuzzi: €5
Massage: €40 / 0.5 hours , Yoga lessons: price on request
Picknick: €35, for 2 persons
Laundry: €5, pay at checkout.    Detergent is at the reception. Drying machine in winter is €2.50
Wastewater (black & grey): You can empty your wastewater at the dump station, located at the water tap at the Glamping’s solar panel. There are two covers where you can unload.
Waste: You can dispose of your waste in the bins in the small garage by the first gate (look for the tall palm trees).
Dog: €3 for the stay. Keep them leashed so our sheep don’t get chased. Pls remove any dog poop
Bathroom: find the outdoor bathroom down the stairs near the Glamping tents. The indoor shower and toilet are under the restaurant and 
Drinks: in the restaurant. Wines, beer, sodas, juice, sangria, cocktail, coffees, tea
Bread: You can get a bread bag if you want to order bread. On its label you write the number of bread buns you want (white or whole grain). Hang the bread bag in the evening, under the bell, at the main gate (tall palm trees). The baker comes at night; there’ll be bread in it tomorrow morning! (except Sundays). You can pay for it when you check out (€0.50/piece).
Checkout and payments are done at the restaurant reception, open from 10h00. If you want to check out earlier, please do the checkout on the evening before. 
Supermarket: Minimercado Salvador (1 km), supermarket Minipreço (2.5 km)

We hope you enjoy our little paradise we’ve been building since 1989.

name: Camping Portugo
title: (6100) Camping Portugo
description: Quinta Portugo is located right in the middle of Portugal (geographical center). ***The site is suitable for mini campers and camping buses up to 6.00 m.**** It is not far from our site to the Atlantic (approx. 60 minutes), to Spain (approx. 90 minutes), to the Serra da Estrela, Tomar, Coimbra, Lisbon and Porto. Our site is in a very quiet location, a small supermarket is within walking distance (700 m), otherwise there is a lot of nature here. Things to do in the immediate vicinity are e.g. B. a waterfall, a dam, a natural rock cave, hikes on the Rio Zezere and much more, please contact us. We have two small washhouses with hot water and a seasonal pool with a small snack bar. Electricity is available and free WiFi. We charge EUR 12.50 for one night. FOR A RESERVATION PLEASE CALL BEFORE OR SIGN BY WHATSAPP!!!

title: (2435) Freixianda - 48 EN356

title: (2200-420) Abrantes - 37 Rua do Pisco
description: Shop where gas bottles can be exchanged. Also the Campinggaz bottles. Not an LPG station. It is also difficult to get there with a camper / car. I went by bicycle. Have been looking for a shop to exchange camping gas bottles for a long time. You can do that here!!

title: (2490) Ourém - 7 Rua Doutor Francisco Sá Carneiro
title_short: (2490) Ourém - 7 Rua Doutor Francisco Sá Carneiro
description: 7 rua Doutor Francisco Sa, carneiro 2490 OUREM Very large car park, on sandy land behind large covered market. Parking without problem to spend the night as the day ...

title: (2205) Tramagal - 62 N118
description: Free water supply for motorhomes. Picnic tables.

title: (3260) Figueiró dos Vinhos - CM1135-1
description: A 10-minute drive from Fragas de São Simão (with river beaches) and close to sport climbing spots. Quiet area surrounded by a small forest. On the same site is the Figueiró dos Vinhos Hunting Club and there are two tennis courts. Water tap without thread. Figueiró dos Vinhos county tourist map (Portuguese + English) at service area.

title: (2200-241) Abrantes - 3 Rua do Girassol
description: Free parking near the city center except market day.

title: () Abrantes -
description: Park dedicated to motorhomes next to Historic Center

title: (2200-365) Abrantes - 26 Rua 17 de Agosto de 1808
description: Very central flat parking with an incredible view towards south. very calm. fantastic night 200m away from the main brand new museum of Abrantes, very worthy to visit. obligatory to eat at the Santa Isabel restaurant and buy the wonderful sweets at the Palha de Abrantes coffee shop.

title: (2490-505) Ourém - 2 Rua Engenheiro Adelino Amaro da Costa
title_short: (2490-505) Ourém - 2 Rua Engenheiro Adelino Amaro da Costa
description:
Quiet place to reset from a trip.
Secure, near a police station. With a nice Parque to walk.

address.street: 2 Rua Engenheiro Adelino Amaro da Costa

title: (2200-201) Abrantes - Esplanada 1 de Maio
description: Super large motorhome parking with a bird's eye view of the Tagus, just behind the courtyard, ideal for a quiet night. Free parking without amenities, which is also used by passenger cars. Amusement center next door, lots of shopping and parties every night.

title: (2260) Vilha Nova Da Barquinha - EM1191
description: Tarmac car park near a railway line (no traffic from 11 p.m. to 4 a.m.) Sadly daytime parking only…informed by GNR officers.

title: (2200) Abrantes - 708 Avenida da Portagem
description:
With a great view to the Ríver Tejo. no facilities. 
This is an authorised location. Overnight stay Up to 48 hrs

title: (2140) Praia do Ribatejo - N118
description: Panoramic view of the Almourol Castle. There are no support services available, but for a night you can stop for a rest.

title: (3260) Figueiró Dos Vinhos -
description: Nice parking, Very calm in the winter. Very close To the river and trekking To a beautiful old stone village.

title: () Abrantes - Esplanada das Docas
description: Parking at the Rio Tejo directly at a busy restaurant and pub, which is open on weekends until 3 am.  There are several waste containers nearby.  Directly opposite on the other side of the river is an event venue where events such as fairs and concerts are held.  There is also the possibility to fill up with water, as well as to dispose of grey water and the toilet.

title: (3260) Simao - Ferraria-Gondramaz-São Simão
description: Parking at the end of the street. very sloping but with a great view and view of the river.

title: (3260) Figueiró dos Vinhos - Rua Principal
description: River Beach Park Aldeia Ana de Aviz. Access to barbecue and water to wash dishes.

title: (2260) Tancos - Avenida e Cais de Tancos
title_short: (2260) Tancos - Avenida e Cais de Tancos
description: Free park without facilities, nice view to the Castle. Near the Tejo river.

title: (2205) Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - 16 Rua do Carvalho
title_short: (2205) Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - 16 Rua do Carvalho
description: Along the Tejo with tables and barbecue.

title: (2205-033) Abrantes - Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - Av. Marginal do Tejo
title_short: (2205-033) Abrantes - Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - Av. Marginal do Tejo
description: Parking - Overnight up to 24 hours

address.city: Abrantes - Rossio ao Sul do Tejo

title: (3240) Avelar - Ferraria-Gondramaz-São Simão
description: Brand new parking lot. Much less sloping than the parking lots at the departure point of the passadiços :) Shaded, really great.

title: (2205) Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - 5 Travessa do Cavaco
title_short: (2205) Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - 5 Travessa do Cavaco
description: Public toilets in front of the river.

name: ParqueTejo - Turismo, Ciência e Lazer (Parque de Campismo e Caravanismo)
title: (2205) ParqueTejo - Turismo, Ciência e Lazer (Parque de Campismo e Caravanismo)
title_short: (2205) ParqueTejo - Turismo, Ciência e Lazer (Parque de Campismo e Caravanismo)
description: Nice camping park with a view over the  Tagus (Tejo) River and Abrantes town hill. Very nice  prices and facilities. All services are free (lot of combined electricity/fresh water plots). Restaurants and grocery stores within walking distance.

title: (2260) Tancos - 2 Avenida e Cais de Tancos
title_short: (2260) Tancos - 2 Avenida e Cais de Tancos
description: Before a parking restaurant near the river

title: (2140) - 1 Rua Conde de Murça
description: Quiet area, tap water, grill, day park, cafes, next to the Tagus.

title: (2490) Ourém - 1 Rua da Bela Vista
description: Simple parking provided for coach but without motorhome ban. Ideal for visiting a medieval castle and "city" inaccessible by camper (because streets limit the width to 2 m). Impossible to sleep there because very steep.

title: (6100-519) Pedrógão Pequeno - Estrada Moinho das Freiras
title_short: (6100-519) Pedrógão Pequeno - Estrada Moinho das Freiras
description: Very steep climb at the end. We barely made it. But it's worth the try.

title: (2490) Ourém - Largo Santa Teresa de Ourém
title_short: (2490) Ourém - Largo Santa Teresa de Ourém
description: Car park easily accessible to 7 m motorhomes, space for half a turn and back by the same road.

name: Parque de Autocaravanas de Arripiado
title: (2140) Parque de Autocaravanas de Arripiado
description: Motorhome park, with gate, powee.Green space on the riverside in Arriado! Parking by the river very quiet

title: (2330) Entroncamento - 1 Avenida das Forças Armadas
description: Parking for camper van, safety could spend the night . Near to a green park, ASA - Entroncamento

name: Parque Campismo Aldeia Ruiva
title: (6150) Parque Campismo Aldeia Ruiva
description:
"Parque Campismo Aldeia Ruiva"
Small camping with separate áreas for motorhomes, tents and bungalows, with dirty wathears under construction and near river beach.

title: (3270) Adega - 72 CM1170
description: Picnic area with bar, benches, barbecue, and very clean public restrooms. Good for a stopover, but not for sleeping, because it is on the side of a road. Parking is tight for a large caravan.

title: (2330) Entroncamento - 89 Avenida das Forças Armadas
description: Nice little swimming pool that we used for a (warm) shower on the way through.

title: (2260) Vila Nova da Barquinha - 46 Rua da Barca
title_short: (2260) Vila Nova da Barquinha - 46 Rua da Barca
description: A calm place to Pic Nic and park camper van

title: (6100-519) Pedrógão Pequeno - 4 Rua do Areal
description: Water point next to an urban park.

title: (2260-396) Vila Nova da Barquinha - 56C Rua Benvinda da Conceição Pereira
title_short: (2260-396) Vila Nova da Barquinha - 56C Rua Benvinda da Conceição Pereira
description:
Lavandaria
has TV, WiFi and gym equipment

title: (6120) Mação - 3 Alameda Infante Dom Henrique
description: Large paved parking lot. Close to the GNR and the center which has no interest. Public WC. Good satellite reception.

title: () Vila Nova da Barquinha - EM1190
description: Very quiet place at night, next to a beautiful park and by the river. Parking and cobblestone pavement, but no traffic at night. Free wifi working only during the day. Well-done and free service area.

title: (2260) Moita do Norte - 71 Rua Salgueiro Maia
title_short: (2260) Moita do Norte - 71 Rua Salgueiro Maia
description: Intermarche park, laundry machine with coin, could park day and night, gas station, park outside.

title: (2330) Entroncamento - 65 Rua Gustave Eiffel
description: New urban park with lots of space for parking, low traffic. Great to walk the dog and do some clean up and maintnaince. Nearby to the highway, may be a bit noisy to sleep.

title: (3240) Chão de Couce - Rua Amarela
description:
VL and PL parking with picnic tables and trash can in an industrial zone. No shade but very quiet.
perfect for a stopover

title: (6100) - CM1098
description: Topview, silence, nearby church;). Do not forget to take care of your waste with you!

title: (3270) Pedrógão Grande - 3270 Rua da Fonte de Baixo
title_short: (3270) Pedrógão Grande - 3270 Rua da Fonte de Baixo
description: Water can fill cans, good flow

title: (3270) Pedrógão Grande - Rua Mário Coelho Fernandes
title_short: (3270) Pedrógão Grande - Rua Mário Coelho Fernandes
description: Parque de estacionamento perto do centro vila. Tranquilo e plano

title: (2490) Ourém - Rua Principal
description: Nice quiet place in olive forest, no service available.

title: (2330) Entroncamento - Rua Diogo Cāo
description: Many truck drivers park here, shopping center E.leclerc

title: (3270) Pedrógão Grande - 30 Avenida Doutor Francisco Sá Carneiro
title_short: (3270) Pedrógão Grande - 30 Avenida Doutor Francisco Sá Carneiro
description: Nice spacious parking place available. Good for bigger campers.

title: (3240) Ansião - 7 Avenida Doutor Vítor Faveiro
description: Parque do Mercado…optimal to visit the whole area…sossegado…care for fairs and market days (Saturday)

title: () - CM1158
description: Place where you can park your motor home for a night. Close to a public garden, and also a football camp with synthetic grass. Silent and quite. Near you have a lot of river beaches. Bathrooms close (just follow the indications).

title: (2490) Ourém - 667 Rua Principal
description: Small village with possibility to park during the day or overnight close to the church. Worth to visit the Dinosaurs Park with feet printings of some of the biggest dinosaurs on earth (Sauropedes) and a small Jurassic Park. Possible to park at the Dinosaurs Park.

title: (3240) Ansião - 2 Rua Manuel Melo
description: Park for small motorhomes

title: (3270) Vila Facaia - EM516
description: Very pleasant place with river beach in the village of Monastery, very quiet place in the middle of nature, good.to stay and overnight is worth trying

title: (3270) Pedrógão Grande - Rua do Vau
description: Beautiful place next to the cabril dam, in the center of nature. good place for baths, with barbecue area with tables, very good place to be, worth getting to this place paradisíaco

title: (6100) - Unnamed Road
description: A small road up a little before the dam and becoming an engraved path will lead you to pretty quiet places at the edge of the water. Welcome swim at the end of the day in the shade of the tall pines. Avoid any time with too bulky vehicles.

title: (6100) Pedrógão Pequeno - Unnamed Road
description: Superb spot very quiet ... I allow myself to add this one because we went in Heavyweight of 2.30m wide and a height of 3.70m ... Some small branches touch but without damage! Possibility to continue the track with other spots further afield ...

name: Pedrogão Grande Camping Park
title: (3270) Pedrogão Grande Camping Park
description:
Pedrogão Grande Camping Park is located next to the Cabril dam over the River Zêzere, 1 km from the village of Pedrogão Grande. With exposure to the east and excellent views over the reservoir and its banks.
There are spacious and flat spaces, suitable for maneuvering and having your vehicle, caravan and/or accessories parked. There is a proper place to supply and unload sanitary cassettes. The Park has a central, circular path, entering on one side of the reception building and exiting on the other.

title: (6150) Vale Água -
description: Nice and easy access tap next to the road. Good water pressure.

title: (6150) - Unnamed Road
description: Top off the mountain, not easy access but very nice view.Ad a table and a tree.Very nice to see the Sunrise.

title: (6150) Proença-a-Nova -
description: Small parking lot, could spend the night there completely relaxed, including a 10m team. You can hardly hear the road above, the adjacent road is hardly used even in August.

title: (6120) Santarem - Ribra de Paia Fome
description: A viewing area with picnic benches, a wisteria-covered pergola, and great views of the tree-lined hills and river below. It is also on a very quiet road.

title: (6120) - Ribra de Paia Fome
description:
Beautiful.spot
Picnic área
nature
natural lake

title: (6100) Troviscal - Unnamed Road
description:
Very quiet spot in a paradisical location by a closed river beach. No services but bins for waste and river to swim in. Lots of hiking opportunities from here.
Low mobile reception, so if you are addicted to your phone go elsewhere.

name: Camping Alvorão
title: (2350) Camping Alvorão
description: Camping Park you need CALL Numbers At placard to open door, safe place near Torres Novas you can go to the city center walking 10 min visit city castle

title: (6120) - Estradão Praia Fluvial (Ponte Asseiceira)
description: River Praia of Carvoeira. Nice river pools in a very beautiful natural environment. Parking on a slight slope. There is a bar, bathrooms and covered area with tables and grills with sink.

title: (3270) - Unnamed Road
description: A quiet location, right on the Albufeira waterfront. There are picnic tables. Ideal for an overnight stay.

title: (6150-519) Proença-a-Nova - 30 Largo da Devesa
description: Picnic tables in the middle of town, with shade and well-kept bathrooms.

title: (2350) Torres Novas - 7 Avenida 8 de Julho
description: Nice park to visit city of Torres Novas. Near everthing, including the indoor market. Forbidden to park on Tuesdays because of local market outdoor market at this place. No water or supplies.

title: (2350) Torres Novas - 3 Avenida Doutor João Martins de Azevedo
title_short: (2350) Torres Novas - 3 Avenida Doutor João Martins de Azevedo
description: Large parking by the roundabout. Leveled. We didn't stay the night but think it would be possible. Short walk to the city center and castle. Don't try and park close to the castle if your vehicle is longer than 6 meters. The streets are very narrow and there's just not much space to park.

address.street: 3 Avenida Doutor João Martins de Azevedo

title: (6150-544) Proença-a-Nova - 5 Rua do Heliporto
description: Free Intermarché service area. 2 places.

name: Parque de Campismo Municipal de Ortiga
title: (6120) Parque de Campismo Municipal de Ortiga
title_short: (6120) Parque de Campismo Municipal de Ortiga
description:
Camp site private 
The beautiful surroundings were devastated by a fire in the summer of 2017.
The site is quiet and neat. Prices are cheap and people are nice. There are no shops around so don't forgot to shop before arriving.

title: (3270) - CM1165
description: Parking place near a little church, places to sit and get fresh water for free! Lake 5min away.

title: (2350) Torres Novas - 171 N3
description: Laundromat, right next door about 100m there is a continent good place to take advantage and go shopping

title: (2495-557) Fátima - 181 Avenida Irmã Lúcia de Jesus
title_short: (2495-557) Fátima - 181 Avenida Irmã Lúcia de Jesus
description: Public toilets

title: (3230) Ferraria Ferraria de São João - CM1196
title_short: (3230) Ferraria Ferraria de São João - CM1196
description: Mountainbike Funtrail of Ferraria de São João. This is the basecamp of the funtrail complete with picnic tables, hot showers, WC, large trash containers and a paid cleaning station for your bike. The trail looks pretty abandoned, the facilities however were open, proper and working. There's only space for 4 vehicles parked door to door, so I'd say 1 camper staying here is plenty.

title: (2350) Pedrógão - R do Arrife do Raro
title_short: (2350) Pedrógão - R do Arrife do Raro
description: Place next to the picknick area, very nice and quiet. A lot of trees and you can do different hiking routes from here. Space for two campers next to the ‘road’.

title: (2350) Pedrógão - 32 Rua Principal, R. do Arrife do Raro
title_short: (2350) Pedrógão - 32 Rua Principal, R. do Arrife do Raro
description: A few meters along the forest path there are several parking facilities. A little slope. Calm.

address.street: 32 Rua Principal, R. do Arrife do Raro

title: (2495-448) Fátima - 123 Avenida Beato Nuno
description: Self-service laundry.

title: (6100) Relvas - EM538
description: Excellent drinking water about 100 m before the pass. Tables and benches invite you to linger. no shadow. max space for 2 mobile homes. Mobile communications satisfactory...good at the top of the pass

title: (2350) Pedrógão - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area at an old quarry with a great view. Ascent from the nature camp only with off-road vehicle / 4x4! Motorhome drivers, please take a look, 30 minutes on foot. Large flat surface made of bare rock

title: (2495) Fátima - Parque do Santuário
description: Nice parking spot. Just behind the sanctuary of Fátima. Very quiet place. No noise. High security.

title: (2495-401) Fátima - 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo
title_short: (2495-401) Fátima - 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo
description: Fatima Parking available for visits. It is true that the number of "camper" places is limited, but apart from "important events and busy days" it is tolerated to park in the "car" parking lot, obviously taking care not to get in the way. In May 2019 the barriers were therefore open and nothing to pay, we stayed one night. Thanks to Fatima for her welcome. SPECIFIC: There are 14 or 15 parking spaces around the site where there is really space, we were in parking lot number 6

address.street: 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo

title: (6040) Gavião - Unnamed Road
description: Good gravel parking for the night. The other spot next to it is forbidden to the motorhome, the Police monitors .. The train goes on the other bank but not disturbing, just the guard dogs of the houses are watching you and barking. 4G full bar.

title: () - Rua do Ferreiro
description: Large parking in a village with all the comforts. Toilet, store, games, table and water.

title: (2495-401) Fátima - 96 Avenida de Dom José Alves Correia da Silva
title_short: (2495-401) Fátima - 96 Avenida de Dom José Alves Correia da Silva
description: Very large free car park near the sanctuary. No delimited places but a lot of places in the shade, paying attention to the height of the branches. Much more accessible than car parks 2 to 7 which fill up quickly.

address.street: 96 Avenida de Dom José Alves Correia da Silva

title: (2495) Fátima - 25 Rua João Paulo II
description: Large free parking with some trees. I do not think that spending the night is disturbing. Provide holds.

title: (6100) Vilões -
description:
Totally off grid, off road area. If you enjoy peace and solitude, you will love this area in the mountains. I would guess nobody has driven these tracks for weeks or months because i had to clear fallen burnt trees out of the way the get my MH thru.

Ensure you take a saw with you to clear your way.

title: (2150) Golegã - Rua dos Castelões
description:
Grátis, calmo, tranquilo e seguro. Sem serviços. Bom para pernoita durante a feira da Golegã, embora concorrido. A 5 minutos a pé do centro da Cidade.

Free, quiet, quiet and safe. No services. Good for overnight stay during the fair of Golegã, although crowded. 5 minutes walk from the city center.

title: (2150) Golegã -
description: Accessible by 4x4 or can be a small van because the path to access it is in very poor condition. Very calm, beautiful sunset over the Tagus, and the ballet of hunting fish

title: (2150) Golegã - 43 Rua Timor Lorosae
description: Service terminal at the Intermarché da Golegã

title: (2495-407) Fátima - 142 Estrada de Leiria
description: LPG station

title: (2140) Vale de Junco - Unnamed Road
description: Nice flat picnic area with fireplace, tables and garbage can.

title: (2495) Fátima - Rua da Charneca
description: In a small road on the outskirts of Fatima, it does not seem to be private (no signs) any time there is a property a little further but it seems that it is a secondary access (field). Possible to park on the side in the annex path where between the trees ... We will spend the night and tell you the result as soon as possible :) .. Very good night in peace, I advise for an evening
